variable.name: STUDY
variable.description: DbGaP substudy accessions of parent study phs000287: phs000226=substudy; phs000301=substudy; phs000377=substudy; phs000400=substudy; phs000667=substudy

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Use of subject's sample. Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; PCR_DNA_SNP: SNP genotyes obtained using PCR amplified DNA; Seq_DNA_SNP: SNP genotypes derived from sequence data; Seq_DNA_Target: Custom targeted DNA sequencing; Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing; Seq_DNA_WholeGenome: Whole genome sequencing
